text: If you did good, you did good for yourselves, and if you did bad/evil/harm so for it (your selves), so if the last`s/end`s/other`s promise came, they will cause God evil/harm (to) your faces/fronts, they will enter the Mosque like they entered it (on) the first/beginning time , and they will destroy/ruin/break (E) what they (the worshippers/slaves) rose over (with) destruction/ruin/breakage
